question: Who can open a Kvitka Pro account?
answer: If you're a registered business ready to grow, you're welcome here! As long as your company passes our quick KYB and compliance check, you're good to go.

question: What documents do I need?
answer:
In order to start our collaboration, please submit the required documentation by e-mail at support-kvitka@gbhs.fr:

• Registration certificate || certificate of incorporation
• Articles of Associations
• UBO and Shareholders register or equivalent proving company ownership
• ID documents (UBOs and directors)

Approval Process:

• Wait for our team to review the submitted documentation.
• You will receive email notifications about the approval status.
• Our team typically processes requests within 2–3 business days.

question: Can everyone access crypto features?
answer: Yes, all our account holders have access to integrated crypto wallets supporting major cryptocurrencies (such as ETH, BNB, MATIC, USDC, USDT), etc.

question: How do I track my transactions?
answer: The KViTKA Pro provides real-time tracking of all transactions, directly from the web platform.

question: Where can I receive payments from?
answer: You can receive payments from worldwide, except certain jurisdictions due to compliance regulations. Prohibited jurisdictions are listed here.

question: To whom can I send payments to?
answer: You can send payments to worldwide, except certain jurisdictions due to compliance regulations. Prohibited jurisdictions are listed here.

question: Are there any places you don’t support yet?
answer: KViTKA Pro does not support accounts or transactions involving certain jurisdictions due to compliance regulations. Prohibited jurisdictions are listed here.
